translations: 渴望的；含情脉脉的；渐渐衰弱的

sentences.sentence: We don't spend much time on this topic today because we have been languishing on outdated ideas for too long.
sentences.translation: 我们今天不会在这个主题上花很多时间，因为我们已经在过时的观点上踌躇太久。

sentences.sentence: With his popularity languishing near an all-time low, he may gain nothing from sticking firmly to his plans despite the howl of protests.
sentences.translation: 在他的支持率持续走低的时候，他如果不顾抗议者的怒吼坚持自己的计划，也许什么好处也捞不到。
